title: Riot please help me i have a problem with emotes just cant use them error code:EM01 and EM05

replies.body:
I've been able to fix this weird EM emote error stuff generally by troubleshooting your connection to make sure it's downloading and uploading this data correctly to the servers. It's not to say your connection is having issues, just sometimes certain wires get crossed when accessing certain bits of info is all. 

Try updating your [**DNS settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq5) and I would also be sure to either [**disable or add exceptions for League to your firewalls**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3).  

Please be sure to let me know if that's not helping so we can dig a bit further and get this figured out!
